p: We used REDTaq Ready Mix from Sigma-Aldrich (USA), and followed the recommended protocol: 5 μL Readymix, 1 μL of forward primer, 1 μL of reverse primer (for a final concentration of 0.5 μM), 1 μL of DNA template (3ng to 5 x 10 −7 ng; ~ 66 to 3.9 x 10 8 DNA copies), and nuclease free water to final volume of reaction 10 μL.
